text:
STANLEY ANDREWS
executive Director
National Project in Agricultural Communications
AMERICAN ASSOCIATION OF LAND-GRANT COLLEGES AND STATE UNIVERSITIES • AMERICAN ASSOCIATION OF AGRICULTURAL COLLEGE EDITORS
WELLS HALL ♦ MICHIGAN STATE UNIVERSITY
EAST LANSING, MICHIGAN
January 31, 1958
Mr. Raymond D. Cheydleur
NAEB Research Committee
University Broadcasting Services
Florida State University
Tallahassee, Florida
Dear Ray*
Sorry to have been the cause of making your mail go
astray. We Bust have taken the wrong address off the list
of seminar participants.
As requested, I*m enclosing an extra copy of the folder
and another of the dittoed sheets that was sent to the seminar
participants. I*d appreciate any other thoughts you might
have on the inventory project.
Newbum and Crary of F.TRC are currently involved in their
annual board meeting and have not been able to give a final
word on their participation in the venture. I expect to hear
from them very soon. At the moment, therefore, things stand
very much as they did when I wrote to you a week ago.
I got in touch with Sam Becker right after the seminar,
but haven* t had anything from him. 1*11 try again today.
Sincerely yours.
John M. Parsey
Research Director
JMPits
cc* Sam Becker, Iowa
Enclosures
